title: Not receiving Password reset email for PBE account
body: I forgot my password to my PBE account, and I've been trying for days to reset it. Still haven't received an email, I checked through spam.

replies.body: If you are having trouble locating your account, our account team can help out.  Just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll look into it.  You'll receive a response asap!
I've opened a ticket but still haven't received a reply
